step_feedback.feedback: Good job sitting or standing comfortably. Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed.
Continue to place your hands on your abdomen. This helps you feel the movement.
You're doing great inhaling through your nose and tightening your muscles. Focus on visualizing fluid moving to your chest.
Excellent job exhaling through your mouth and relaxing your muscles. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out.
Great start on your second repetition. Remember to keep your hands on your abdomen.
Continue placing your hands on your abdomen to feel the breath's effect.
Well done inhaling through your nose and tightening your muscles. Visualize the fluid moving towards your chest.
Fantastic job exhaling through your mouth and relaxing. Keep visualizing that fluid being pushed out.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercises! Remember to keep your hands on your abdomen to feel the movement and visualize the fluid flow as you inhale and exhale. This helps stimulate lymphatic drainage effectively.
